title: After The Attack
body:
After The Attack

A man who looks to be in his mid thirties stood at the same place looking in front of him without moving.

The man had deep black hair and dark green eyes. From time to time a small amount of aura was leaking out from his body like he was unable to control his emotions.

Whenever his aura leaks out the surrounding air around him trambles indicating the person was definitely a high ranking hunter.

"I should have kept more hunters by my side instead of sending most of them to the front line" Ron, the S rank hunter who was stationed in the city to stop the attack of dark guild said, as a sigh escaped from his mouth.

He was looking at the completely destroyed area in front of him which was filled with rubbles and debris of the destroyed buildings.

The destroyed area in front of him was used to be city plaza of the city.

But now other than destroyed buildings and corpses of the civilians, there was nothing in that area.
